data.name: ApplicationNotInitialized_Ex_Msg
data.value: Gallery Server has not been properly initialized. This can happen when the initialization code that must run during application startup does not successfully complete, perhaps due to a failure to connect to the data store or another exception. For the web version of Gallery Server, the startup code is invoked from any of the application entry points: the constructor of the GalleryPage class (GalleryPage.cs), the static constructor of the web services class (Gallery.asmx.cs), or one of the HTTP handlers (getmedia.ashx, gettreeviewxml.ashx). This error can often be resolved by restarting the application.

data.name: CannotMoveDirectoryException_Ex_msg
data.value: Cannot move album: The operating system won't allow the directory containing the album to be moved. This can occur when the web server user account has insufficient permissions, or the directory contents are being displayed in another window.

data.name: CannotTransferAlbumToNestedDirectoryException_Ex_msg
data.value: You cannot move or copy an album to itself or to one of its child albums. No assets were transferred.

data.name: DefaultDirectoryPath
data.value: <no directory specified>

data.name: DefaultFilename
data.value: <no file specified>

data.name: InvalidAlbum_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid Album: An Album ID was omitted or, if specified, does not represent a valid album.

data.name: InvalidAlbum_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Invalid Album ID: {0} does not represent a valid album.

data.name: InvalidGalleryServerRole_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid Gallery Server Role: The role does not exist in the data store or one is being created with invalid parameters.

data.name: InvalidUser_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid User: The user does not exist in the data store or one is being created with invalid parameters.

data.name: InvalidMediaObjectsDirectory_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid media asset directory: Gallery Server cannot find or does not have permission to access the media object directory. Verify that the setting corresponds to a valid directory and that the web application has read, write and modify permission to this location.

data.name: InvalidMediaObjectsDirectory_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Invalid media asset directory: Gallery Server cannot find or does not have permission to access the media object directory "{0}". Verify that the setting corresponds to a valid directory and that the web application has read, write and modify permission to this location.

data.name: InvalidMediaObject_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid Media Object: A media object ID was omitted or, if specified, does not represent a valid media object.

data.name: InvalidMediaObject_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Invalid Media Object ID: {0} does not represent a valid media object.

data.name: SynchronizationInProgress_Ex_Msg
data.value: A synchronization is already in progress.

data.name: SynchronizationTerminationRequested_Ex_Msg
data.value: The end user has requested the cancellation of a currently executing synchronization. The synchronization has been canceled per the request.

data.name: UnexpectedFormData_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid Form Data: The form data for this web page contains unexpected data.

data.name: UnexpectedQueryString_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid Query String: The query string contains unexpected data.

data.name: UnsupportedImageType_Ex_Msg
data.value: Unsupported image: The .NET Framework is unable to load an image file into the System.Drawing.Bitmap class. This is probably because it is corrupted, not an image supported by the .NET Framework, or the server does not have enough memory to process the image.

data.name: UnsupportedImageType_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Unsupported image: the file {0} cannot be loaded into the .NET Framework's System.Drawing.Bitmap class. This is probably because it is corrupted, not an image supported by the .NET Framework, or the server does not have enough memory to process the image.

data.name: UnsupportedMediaObjectType_Ex_Msg
data.value: The gallery does not allow files of this type to be added to the gallery.

data.name: GallerySecurity_Ex_Msg
data.value: You do not have authorization to perform the requested action. This could be because of limited permissions granted to anonymous users or, if you are logged in, you do not belong to a role that authorizes the requested action, or none of the roles to which you belong allow the action for the requested album.

data.name: Business_Ex_Msg
data.value: An error has occurred in the GalleryServer.Business namespace.

data.name: Data_Ex_Msg
data.value: An error has occurred in the GalleryServer.Data namespace.

data.name: Web_Ex_Msg
data.value: An error has occurred in the GalleryServer.Web namespace.

data.name: UnsupportedMediaObjectType_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Files of this type ({0}) are not allowed to be added to the gallery.

data.name: CannotWriteToDirectory_Ex_Msg
data.value: Gallery Server cannot write to a directory.

data.name: CannotWriteToDirectory_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Gallery Server cannot write to the directory "{0}".

data.name: CannotReadFromDirectory_Ex_Msg
data.value: Gallery Server cannot read from a directory. This may be due to insufficient permissions. Check that the directory exists and that the IIS application pool has read permission for it.

data.name: CannotReadFromDirectory_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Gallery Server cannot read from the directory "{0}". This may be due to insufficient permissions. Check that the directory exists and that the web application has read permission for it.

data.name: Cannot_Send_Email_Lbl
data.value: Cannot send e-mail

data.name: Email_Subject_Prefix_When_Ex_Type_Present
data.value: Error:
data.comment: The text to prefix with the exception type for use as an e-mail subject. Applies only when the exception type is known.

data.name: Email_Subject_When_No_Ex_Type_Present
data.value: Error Report
data.comment: The subject to use in an e-mail when the exception type is unknown

data.name: CannotDeleteAlbum_Ex_Msg
data.value: Cannot delete album

data.name: CannotDeleteAlbum_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Cannot delete album: The album {0} cannot be deleted.

data.name: InvalidLicenseException_Ex_Msg
data.value: Gallery Server does not have a valid license or you are attempting to perform an action that violates the current license. You can purchase a license at www.galleryserverpro.com.

data.name: InvalidGallery_Ex_Msg
data.value: Invalid Gallery: A Gallery ID was omitted or, if specified, does not represent a valid gallery.

data.name: InvalidGallery_Ex_Msg2
data.value: Invalid Gallery ID: {0} does not represent a valid gallery.
